description.short: Discover and connect with people nearby who share your interests.
description.full:
Link helps you discover and connect with like-minded people in your area. Whether you're looking for new friends, activity partners, or professional connections, Link makes it easy to find people who share your interests and passions.

Key Features:
• Discover people nearby with similar interests
• Swipe to connect with potential friends
• Chat with your new connections
• Find local events and opportunities
• Build meaningful relationships in your community

Safety First:
• Robust privacy controls
• Location sharing only when you choose
• Report and block features
• Secure messaging

Join thousands of users who have found meaningful connections through Link. Download now and start building your community!

localizations.name: Link
localizations.subtitle: Connect with people around you
localizations.description: Discover and connect with people nearby who share your interests.

age_rating.description: Designed for ages 4 and up. May contain infrequent mild profanity or crude humor.
